alert.note: Alert for Cass; Fulton; Grant; Huntington; Miami; Pulaski; Wabash; Wells; White (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 8:11PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Wabash, northern Grant, northeastern White, southern Huntington, southwestern Fulton, southern Pulaski, southwestern Wells, Cass and central Miami Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 808 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Francesville to near Van Buren. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Van Buren. This includes Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 265 and 279. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Flood Advisory has been issued for a portion of this area.

area.areaDesc: Cass; Fulton; Grant; Huntington; Miami; Pulaski; Wabash; Wells; White
